sources.name: DataSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		Function as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as string,
		EndDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['SampleData/Emps/today/*.csv']) ~> DataSource

sources.name: ParamsFile
sources.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ParamsFile

sinks.name: sinkData
sinks.script:
SelectCols sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'filename') ~> sinkData

transformations.name: ParseFileName
transformations.script:
ParamsFile derive(filedate = split(Column_1,'=')[1],
		filename = split(Column_1,'=')[2]) ~> ParseFileName

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
DataSource, FilterToday join(1 == 1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: SelectCols
transformations.script:
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		Region,
		Status,
		Function,
		Level,
		Role,
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		filename
	))~> SelectCols
